channel.title: Mister Baby Podcast
channel.description: Sean and Beryl a.k.a. Mister Baby, team up with guests and invite you to reminisce about great times in their lives. From New York to Shanghai and every else in-between, join us for ex-pat and local tales from everywhere in the world.
channel.itunes:summary: Sean and Beryl, a.k.a. Mister Baby, team up with guests and invite you to reminisce about great times in their lives. From New York to Shanghai and everywhere else in-between, join us for ex-pat and local tales from everywhere in the world.
channel.itunes:author: Mister Baby Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Sean and Beryl a.k.a. Mister Baby, team up with guests and invite you to reminisce about great times in their lives.

item.title: Ep #2: HoneyBadgers w/ Annie Wong, Jenny Wu, & Clarissa Dourmashkin-Cagol
item.description: This week Beryl and I sat down a group of ladies from around the world, who have all ended up here in Shanghai at one time or another. Annie, Jenny, and Clarissa share their stories from living and traveling abroad, the wonderlust they feel while working around the globe, and how their adventures have shapes the connections they still have today. Oh, and of course MOOOSH!
item.itunes:subtitle: Hong Kong, Paris, New York, and Shanghai, the honeybadger ladies have really traveled the globe, and are here to share their stories.
item.itunes:summary: This week Beryl and I sat down a group of ladies from around the world, who have all ended up here in Shanghai at one time or another. Annie, Jenny, and Clarissa share their stories from living and traveling abroad, the wonderlust they feel while working around the globe, and how their adventures have shapes the connections they still have today. Oh, and of course MOOOSH! 1:09:39 no

item.title: Ep #2: Start-ups & Animal Dung w/ Alex Duncan
item.description: This week Beryl and I sat down with Alex Duncan our friend and ex-boss to chat about his many business ventures while he's been in Shanghai. We learned about how he took his degree in zoology and turned that into start-ups in the fashion world, the art world, the fly fishing world, and now the tech world.
item.itunes:subtitle: From a teenage computer nerd, to a degree in Zoology, Alex Duncan tells us how he leveraged his talents and opportunities into several business ventures that have truely run the start-up landscape gamut here in China.
item.itunes:summary: This week Beryl and I sat down with Alex Duncan our friend and ex-boss to chat about his many business ventures while he's been in Shanghai. We learned about how he took his degree in zoology and turned that into start-ups in the fashion world, the art world, the fly fishing world, and now the tech world.
item.itunes:author: Mister Baby Podcast

item.title: Ep #1: Hamburger Stabbing w/ Tim Neesham
item.description: This week we sat down with our friend Tim Neeshan and heard all kinds of amazing stories from his travels around the world. From trouble with street kids in South America, to hillybillies of the Australian Outback, Tim has certainly seen some things, and that was all before he landed here in Shanghai.
item.itunes:subtitle: From trouble with street kids in South America, to hillybillies of the Australian Outback, Tim has certainly seen some things, and that was all before he landed here in Shanghai.

item.title: Ep #0: The Roadtrip w/ Beryl and Sean
item.description: For Episode 0, Beryl and I sat down and just chatted with ourselves as sort of an intro to the podcast. We ( mostly B ) ended up telling the story of our road trip across America, and how it tested our friendship, but inevitably bringing us much closer.
